item.title: LOC SMS Version 4 Overview
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information What’s new in LOC SMS version 4 and how it interacts with LOC SMS version 3.5. Version 4 Concepts LOC SMS version 4 is a layer consisting of services and options that are installed on top of LOC SMS version 3.5 and is currently used only for eSuite, mFloor, eKiosk and the two eCommerce […]

item.title: Release Notes
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information Important information that must be known before upgrading to version 4.5.0 of the LOC Software Management Suite (SMS). System Requirements When upgrading to LOC SMS V4 (eSuite), the LOC SMS version 3.5.0 is required as a base software. This also means that all the necessary steps, security and changes done with version 3.5.0 also […]

item.title: KB Editor Features Demo
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Article Headings The headings are used to represent the internal hierarchy, they are also used to build the Table of Contents that appears on the side of each document. So always start a section with H2, then its children (if any) use H3), but other sections should revers to H2 to maintain the document’s hierarchical […]
